sections.title: The Self
sections.thesis: The archetype of wholeness as a center ordering psychic life beyond ego control.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: The archetype of wholeness and psychic totality that orders life beyond the ego standpoint.
The developmental process of integrating conscious and unconscious contents toward greater wholeness.

sections.body: Synthesis: The archetype of wholeness as a center ordering psychic life beyond ego control. Next, "Christ, a Symbol of the Self" extends the same symbolic field under a new historical and conceptual register.
